parameters.name: CasterId
parameters.description: The ID of the production studio. It is included in the response when you call the [CreateCaster](~~69338#doc-api-live-CreateCaster~~ "Creates a production studio.") operation.

parameters.name: EpisodeId
parameters.description: The ID of the episode. It is included in the response when you call the [AddCasterEpisode](~~94745#doc-api-live-AddCasterEpisode~~ "Adds an episode to a production studio.") operation.
